alert.note: Alert for Goshen County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued February 14 at 1:16PM MST until February 14 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Northwest winds 30 to 40 MPH with occasional gusts 50 to 55 MPH. A few gusts up to 60 MPH are possible, especially on exposed ridgetops. * WHERE...In Wyoming, Goshen County including the city of Torrington. In Nebraska, Scotts Bluff, Banner, and Morrill counties including Scottsbluff, Harrisburg, and Bridgeport. * WHEN...Until 6 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Strong cross winds will be hazardous to light weight or high profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.
